credit_line: Gift of John Goldsmith Phillips, Jr.
title: Summer in the Country, from Appletons' Journal of Literature, Science and Art, July 10, 1869, p. 465
description: Four young ladies playing croquet, sport.  In the center, background, two ladies socialize.  In the right foreground, a young lady appears to be looking at her nails on her right hand, while the girl on the left rests her foot on a croquet ball and looks at the girls in the background.
name: Print
